alert.note: Alert for Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flash Flood Statement issued February 21 at 6:57PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM SST FOR TUTUILA AND AUNUU... Satellite indicates heavy rainfall near Tutuila and Aunu`u. Flash flooding is imminent or already occurring. O LOO FAAAUAU PEA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 657 AFIAFI ASO GAFUA FEPUARI 21 2022 O LOO FAAAUAU PEA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA MO TUTUILA MA AUNU`U SEI`A OO I LE 9 PM SST. Sa va`aia i satelite timuga tetele o loo i luga, pe o lata fo`i i Tutuila ma Aunu`u. O nei timuga ua fa`atupula`ia ai lologa ma tafega i le taimi nei po o se taimi lata mai. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O LE UIGA O LE LAPATAIGA MO LOLOGA MA TAFEGA UA IAI NEI LOLOGA PO O TAFEGA I LE ATUNUU I NOFOAGA MAUALALO FAAPEA AUALA-TELE. AFAI O LOU MAOTA E LATA I ALA-VAI PE O LOO I NOFOAGA MAUALALO...IA TULA`I ESE MA AGA`I ATU LOA I NOFOAGA MAPU`EPU`E. AUA NE`I SAVALIA PE UIA AUALA UA IAI TAFEGA PO O LOLOGA. IA RIPOTIA TULAGA LOULOUA O LE TAU MA NISI FAALETONU I LE OFISA O LEOLEO PO O LE EOC...E LATOU TE FAAILOA MAI LAU RIPORT I LE OFISA O LE TAU.
info.instruction: A Flash Flood Warning means flash flooding is imminent or occurring in streams, roads and low lying areas. Move to higher ground immediately if your home is in a flood prone area. Do not cross fast flowing or rising waters in your vehicle or on foot. Report severe weather to the local police officials or the emergency operations center (EOC). They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Office.
